page.title: 14WESTWOOD VILLAGE
page.content: Westwood is a small village in Nottinghamshire. Today it is almost joined to the larger village of {Jacksdale}by a newly built housing estate. However, despite this it has still managed to retain it's own identity with its own infant school and United Reform Church. The brick built church of{St. Mary stands half way between Jacksdale and Westwood and serves both villages. The name Westwood probably means the area west of the woods. The trees were probably originally cleared for farming purposes.
